entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:14 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
